posts.title: East Timor Diving Rate
posts.text: Diving Rate One Day Diving Package 2 dives 3 dives with lunch box Shore dive in Dili area $90 $120 Boat dive in Dili area $110 $140 Shore dives in east/west coast $100 Boat dives in east/west coast $130 $160 Boat dives in Atauro island $140 $170 Note price including all dive equipment except dive computer price including pickup service in nearby hotel ( hotel california â€¦) price including drinking water AccomodationHotel California Price start from $50, Hotel california provide you nice room and accomodation. With very short distance to our diveshop, it will be much easier if you stay here to dive with us. We can book for you in the hotel and if you stay here, we will pick you up every day for diving. You can also make your booking in other booking platform or contact them directly Other HotelsAlthough there are many other hotel in dili you can choose to stay, please do contact us to make sure we can provide free pickup service.
